publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3168.1 Bill Butler: Glasgow Airport—As an amendment to motion (S1M-3168) in the name of Tommy Sheridan, leave out from "politically" to end and insert "to this new rail link in early course; recognises that such a commitment should not, of itself, prejudice the future of other Scottish airports, and invites Glasgow’s elected representatives to support the provisions of this motion."
S1M-3168.1 Glasgow Airport (lodged on 10 June 2002) Irene Oldfather*
S1M-3168.1 Glasgow Airport (lodged on 10 June 2002) Janis Hughes*

S1M-3168.1 Bill Butler: Glasgow Airport-As an amendment to motion (S1M-3168) in the name of Tommy Sheridan, leave out from "politically" to end and insert "to this new rail link in early course; recognises that such a commitment should not, of itself, prejudice the future of other Scottish airports, and invites Glasgow's elected representatives to support the provisions of this motion." Supported by: Irene Oldfather, Janis Hughes
S1M-3168.1 Glasgow Airport (lodged on 10 June 2002) Mr Kenneth Macintosh*
S1M-3168.1 Glasgow Airport (lodged on 10 June 2002) Pauline McNeill*
